title: Block slides down variably rough incline

content.question: Interval Mechanical Energy Dissipated due to Friction 1 <math alttext="0" overflow="scroll"><mn>0</mn></math> 2 <math alttext="W sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> 3 <math alttext="W sub 3" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math> 4 <math alttext="W sub 4" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math> A block slides down an inclined plane whose roughness varies. Only during time interval 1 does the block slide with negligible friction. The coefficient of kinetic friction during time interval 3 is twice the coefficient of kinetic friction during time interval 2. The graph shows the blockâ€™s velocity as a function of time. The table lists the mechanical energy dissipated due to friction over the different time intervals. Which of the following claims is true?

choices.label: <math alttext="the absolute value of W sub 4, end absolute value, is greater than, the absolute value of W sub 3, end absolute value, which is greater than, the absolute value of W sub 2, end absolute value" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded><mo>></mo><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded><mo>></mo><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="the absolute value of W sub 2, end absolute value, equals, the absolute value of W sub 3, end absolute value, which equals, the absolute value of W sub 4, end absolute value" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded><mo>=</mo><mpadded><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded><mo>=</mo><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="the absolute value of W sub 3, end absolute value, is greater than, the absolute value of W sub 2, end absolute value, which is greater than, the absolute value of W sub 4, end absolute value" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded><mo>></mo><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded><mo>></mo><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, the absolute value of W sub 2, end absolute value, equals, the absolute value of W sub 4, end absolute value, close parenthesis, which is greater than, the absolute value of W sub 3, end absolute value" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded><mo>=</mo><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded><mo>></mo><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the absolute value of W sub 3, end absolute value, is greater than, the absolute value of W sub 2, end absolute value, which is greater than, the absolute value of W sub 4, end absolute value" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded><mo>></mo><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded><mo>></mo><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
